title: pUraNAnanda brahmamE
sahitya:
pUraNAnanda brahmamE en puNNiya vasattinAlE naNNiya tiNNiya uruvE


anupallavi

  AraNattilum venren idayattait-toTTE rAjayOga siddhi Indanai eTTil


caraNam    tangattilE maNi vaittadenrE sAdhu sangattilE iranrengum ennai vazhi
kATTi naDatti shuddhAnandamAkkinai tITTiya mAmaNit-tIyenuL Ukkinai
